header.title: How to Age gracefully: Fight Ageism
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: Ageism, or prejudice against someone based on age , is the last acceptable form of discrimination.It affects both men and women but it does so differently. Women are judged on age and age related looks a lot more than men.. . Read full article here:. . http://theladyoftheworld.com/2015/09/...

commentThread.commentText: yeah but were not on earth to be  people pleaser . just ourselves. and god .all.women beautiful.
Thank you for this. I was on the edge of wanting to end my life and this made me inch a bit closer to the side of maybe not. Middle Aged Women have it so hard and I am so tired of it.
Thanks for this. Beautiful words and woman and it has inspired me to be who I am and never pretend to be someone else, younger or prettier or whatever . Greetings from Syngapore

Excellent video, just outstanding. This is so very true. I also loved the article . If you would like to work for us as a public speaker , drop us an email. Ive already written to you so please check your inbox, you are a very inspirational woman with a big intellect and we would love to have you as our guest.

replies.commentText: +Julia Anne That is so kind! thanks for watching and thank you for the invite. I have now replied. Lets spread the word
